attributes.action: Help working families get more financial help when struggling
attributes.additional_details: This needs to change and help us British get more financial help and working families onto the property ladder
attributes.background: Both me and my partner work and have a 2 year old. We went to the government for a bit of help and got refused so we have struggled financially. You see on take people who don't want to work and non British citzens getting loads of help.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to support families who are struggling financially. For example, if you would like the level of tax credits to be increased, you could start a petition asking for that.
